greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of independent sets of nodes in graph K_6 X C_n (n > 2).
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (5,7,1).
formula: a(n) = (3 - sqrt(10))^n + (3 + sqrt(10))^n + 5 for n even.
a(n) = (3 - sqrt(10))^n + (3 + sqrt(10))^n - 5 for n odd.
program: (MAGMA) I:=[7, 1, 43]; [n le 3 select I[n] else 5*Self(n-1)+7*Self(n-2)+Self(n-3): n in [1..25]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Apr 27 2012
results.author: Stephen G. Penrice (spenrice(AT)ets.org), Dec 19 1999
ext: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Dec 20 1999
